name: Daybreak Legends: Origin
description:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed with an in-house, next-gen engine that delivers fluid combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

Use devastating blows and various combos in a satisfying combat experience! A huge world gives the player near limitless gameplay scenarios. Fight through epic raids, duel your friends in ranked or unranked matches, battle competing guilds, raise a warpet, and even fight dragons in aerial combat!

●BACKGROUND●
An evil dragon has come, and with it, the world has been beseeched by disaster and war. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and shine light again onto our world. In order to find the artifact and eliminate this global threat, brave adventurers embark on a journey into the unknown.

●FEATURES●
- Our unique Skywing System allows for players to partake in thrilling aerial battles!
- Fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view!

◆VISUAL FEAST●
- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
- Exquisite character art and design

◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●
- As a MMOARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses
- Battle alongside your friends and find them easily with our unique social system.
-Found that special friend? Our marriage system allows for players to team up permanently to score huge stat boosts!

◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●
- Play as one of five unique classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter, Lancer, and Warrior.
-Over 250 skill combinations
- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, gear, and fashion options
- Improve your combat strategy with our powerful warpets!

●COMMUNITY●
